answers.answer: It can be hypertention doesnt always mean pre-eclampsia, i had eclampsia it comes along with swelling, protein in urine and high blood pressure, but is high blood pressure the only concern?
Yes just the high blood pressure...
Hmmm then its most likely hypertension, how many weeks are you?
23 weeks. Yea idk hes  asking Me to check my BP twice a day but I.Dont have the monitor thING...

Cant you go in to a clinic/doctor surgery or anything? And 23 weeks ahhh well yes it could become pre-eclampsia so i suppose you really need to keep an eye or maybe bool another appointment with him again in 2 weeks to check?
Yea but he had me to.collect my urine test for preeclampsia but came out negative. Maybe too much sodium I need to cut down...

question: I had to collect my urine for 24 hrs for preeclampsia but doc said today I'm fine everythings.normal but apparently my high blood pressures very high... He doesn't know why or how my blood pressures high so I guess now I'm on a medication nd have to check my blood.pressure twice a day...
title: on a medication...
